message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I get a bit more now, and we avoid the risk of getting nothing.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering I'm taking the risk of going to the next round.
Bob, let's be real. This is the fairest it's going to get. 50/50, take it or leave it.
You said 50/50 was your fairest offer, but I think I can do better than that.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to be generous, but you're pushing your luck. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll come back to the table.
Okay Bob, you win. You're a tough negotiator. But let's be clear, this is only because we're running out of time.
